HOMEPAGE_SUBTITLE: Discover endless opportunities with every swipe - your dream career is just a scroll away!
JOB_DESC: Welcome to Swip, the app that transforms job searching into a fast and enjoyable experience. Say goodbye to endless job boards and complicated filters. With Swip, you can discover new opportunities effortlessly and make decisions with just a swipe.
WHAT_IS_SWIP: Swip is built for modern job seekers who want simplicity and efficiency. Whether you're taking the first step in your career, seeking a change, or exploring new opportunities, Swip makes the process easy and engaging. Ready to start your journey? Download Swip now and swipe your way to success!
SWIPE_LEFT_DESC: Not the right fit? Swipe left and move on to the next opportunity
SWIPE_RIGHT_DESC: See a job that interests you? Swipe right to send your application instantly.
ARE_YOU_TIRED: We have a question. Are you tired with job searching?
ABOUT: The app that transforms job searching into a fast and enjoyable experience. Say goodbye to endless job boards and complicated filters. With Swip, you can discover new opportunities effortlessly and make decisions with just a swipe.
